amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike a provision which automatically defines all data submitted by State, County or Tribal governments as the "best available science," regardless of its merit.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 113-563 to strike a provision which automatically defines all data submitted by State, County or Tribal governments as the "best available science," regardless of its merit.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Holt amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 204 - 215 (Roll no. 461).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Holt amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 204 - 215 (Roll no. 461).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Holt.
